Anyone interested in a larger group or SGC 10 and/or SGC 20 cards, shoot me an email...have anywhere from 10 - 60 or so of each.

I can either send you a list of cards or if you have a group you are looking for, just shoot me a list.

thanks,
Rob ~ [url]rgutheil@gmail.com[/url]

any chance you have sovereigns of : Pat Moran, ed Reulbach (front view) or Sheckard portrait?

Thanks
